issue.title: [Rust] Donate DataFusion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4263](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4263). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I am starting work on a PR to donate the DataFusion source code.

If the vote is passed we will be ready to merge. If the vote is not passed we can close this issue and delete the PR.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4263?focusedCommentId=16760081) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
